deployedGeneratedSources.name: #utility.yul

devdoc.details: A simple smart contract to store and verify dental material authenticity based on the hash of their Raman spectroscopy data.

getMaterialHash(string).details: Retrieves the stored data hash for a given product ID. The verification logic (comparing this stored hash with a live hash) will be done off-chain by the backend.

registerMaterial(string,string,string).details: Registers a new material by storing the hash of its spectral data. The combination of productID should be unique.

params._batchID: The batch number of the product.
params._dataHash: The SHA-256 hash of the Raman spectroscopy data file.
params._productID: Unique identifier for the product (e.g., SKU, model number).

devdoc.title: SpectroChain
